DOC.brief_summary: A crossover trial carry healthy volunteer age 45-70 year BMI < 30 kg/m2 . Subjects consume Antioxidant Supplement ( AS ) contain 65 mg punicalagin mix 3.3 mg hydroxytyrosol 3 time daily Control Supplement ( CS ) maltodextrin 8 wk phase 4-wk rest period . Supplementation order randomly assign consumption derivative product punicalagin and/or hydroxytyrosol restrict . The endothelial function parameter ( brachial artery flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) , biochemical marker ) , inflammatory marker nutritional status evaluate phase . Previously pilot study complete placebo ( n=30 ) determinate effective dose Functional Supplement .
DOC.brief_title: Punicalagin Hydroxytyrosol Mixture Different Inflammatory Markers
DOC.criteria: Men woman 45 75 year old ; Signed informed consent Individuals cardiovascular risk factor drug treatment ( dyslipidemia , hypertension , Diabetes Mellitus ) ; Individuals Metabolic Syndrome ; Individuals familiar background premature cardiovascular disease ; Individuals BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 ; Women still maintain menstrual cycle ; Individuals increase alcohol consumption 30g/day ; Individuals stop smoke next 20 week ( study ) ; Individuals consume antioxidant supplement , drug , ω3 supplement , vitamin , mineral , prebiotics or/and probiotic ; Women consume oral contraceptive ; Individuals mental disease low cognitive function ; Individuals severe disease ( hepatic , kidney , cancer… ) ; Individuals drug supplement consumption weight lose ; Pregnant woman lactate ; Individuals intensive physical activity ; Individuals physical problem comply recommendation physical activity diet general recommendation .
